alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 09 at 9:20PM PST until February 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Mountains, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys; Ventura County Mountains
